iiv.display

Interface ShowPointControllerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ShowPointTracker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShowPointController

    public interface ShowPointControllerInterface
extends ShowPointTracker
    ShowPointControllerInterface defines methods from ShowPointDialog to allow running with ShowPointDialog absent.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    ShowPointImage, CNUDisplay

    • Method Detail

      • setMainShowPointDisplayLinesFreezeState

        void setMainShowPointDisplayLinesFreezeState(boolean freeze)
        Sets whether the main display selected show point display lines are frozen.
        Parameters:
        freeze - if true selected lines will be frozen.

      • setMainShowPointDisplayLinesRecordState

        void setMainShowPointDisplayLinesRecordState(boolean state)
        Sets whether the main display selected show point display lines record.
        Parameters:
        state - if true selected lines will be set to record.

      • addShowPointPair

        void addShowPointPair(ShowPointDisplay spd,
                      ShowPointImage spi,
                      boolean undoFlag)
        Adds a show point display and show point image as a pair that show points and possibly creates undo/redo history for the add.
        Parameters:
        spd - ShowPointDisplay to try adding.
        spi - image to associate with spd
        undoFlag - if true creates undo/redo history

      • removeShowPointPair

        void removeShowPointPair(ShowPointDisplay spd,
                         boolean undoFlag)
        Removes a show point display and show point image pair from list that shows points with possible undo/redo.
        Parameters:
        spd - ShowPointDisplay to try removing.
        undoFlag - if true creates undo/redo history

      • setLinesFreeze

        void setLinesFreeze(boolean freeze)
        Sets whether the selected ShowPointLines should be frozen.
        Parameters:
        freeze - true to freeze selected ShowPointLines

      • setLinesRecord

        void setLinesRecord(boolean record)
        Sets whether the selected ShowPointLines should record points.
        Parameters:
        record - true to record points of selected ShowPointLines

      • setCrosshairColor

      • setCrosshairState

        void setCrosshairState(boolean show)
        Sets whether the crosshair should be visible while showing points.
        Parameters:
        show - true to show crosshairs during showpoint

        Sets whether the crosshair should be visible for selected ShowPointLines.
        Parameters:

      • setLinesTrackingState

        void setLinesTrackingState(boolean track)
        Sets whether the selected ShowPointLines should track the current point.
        Parameters:
        track - true to track current point

      • setRecordState

        void setRecordState(boolean record)
        Sets whether the to record points from the showpoint source.

      • addShowPointLine

        ShowPointDisplayLine addShowPointLine(ShowPointImage spi,
                                      ShowPointDisplayLine spdl,
                                      java.awt.Container container)
        Adds a component to list of images to show point for.
        Parameters:
        spdl - ShowPointDisplayLine to try adding. If null a new line will be created.
        spi - image to try adding a ShowPointDisplayLine for
        Returns:
        ShowPointDisplayLine added or null if image null or already in list

        Gets whether show point lines track mapped location or point locations.
        Returns:
        mapTracking true if lines track mapped location

      • setComponentCrosshair

        void setComponentCrosshair(ShowPointImage spi,
                           ShowPointDisplay spd,
                           int[] newIndices,
                           java.awt.Color newColor,
                           boolean undoFlag)
        Sets a components crosshair and displays the value in a ShowPointDialogLine while creating an undo/redo history.
        Specified by:
        setComponentCrosshair in interface ShowPointTracker
        Parameters:
        spi - ShowPointImage to set crosshair for. If null determines from spdl or returns
        spd - ShowPointDisplay to set values of If null determines from spi or ignores
        newIndices - Indices to set crosshair to
        newColor - Color to set crosshair to
        undoFlag - true to create undo/redo history
